website_summaries.verdict: The SuperTooth Crystal is a simple Bluetooth car speakerphone, relying largely on your smartphone to do the heavy lifting, but it has a few tricks up its sleeve to make it easy to live with.
pros: The SuperTooth Crystal in-car Bluetooth speakerphone features quality construction with a metal faceplate and a snappy magnetic mounting clip
The Crystal can display its battery level on a paired iPhone's status bar
Simple pairing eliminates the need for a PIN and multipoint allows two phones to be simultaneously connected
cons: The placement of the USB charging port means the device can't be charged while it's mounted

customer_reviews.title: Slight modification made
customer_reviews.text: I put a spacer under the visor clip to make the unit point more toward me. The straighter it is pointing toward me the clearer the sound quality. I found that when the unit is not pointing directly at me it sounded somewhat muffled. I am an older buyer, which may account for some sound degradation. I like using this unit because both hands are always on the steering wheel and with the new laws requiring no handheld devices, this is a perfect solution. I see people struggling to use their phones and drive and wonder why they are not using a unit like the SuperTooth.
customer_reviews.author: rbt55

customer_reviews.title: Unit works but ......
customer_reviews.text: I bought this unit after returning a similar unit from Jabra. I really wanted a unit that automatically engaged my phone when I got into the car which this one does but only after a full minute or more. This unit has good battery life and operates as described, The unit is very compact and the audio capabilities are fairly loud but quality could be better. The voice command software on my LG Optimus G PRO does not work very well with this device and that is a disappointment,. But if you are looking for a unit that works and is a lower price than Motorola this is the one.
customer_reviews.author: Fyrecomm

customer_reviews.title: Very handy for use in my car!
customer_reviews.text: It works very well in my car. It paired very easily with my phone. The only drawback is trying to call someone and saying their name into the speaker. You have to be vvvvvvverrrrry clear in what you are saying or it will take you all over the place. But, to be fair, I'm still learning and may not be in the know about how to work it all just yet. Having fun learning though. If you don't have it already installed in your car, I do recommend this one. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Debra Schultheis

customer_reviews.title: I love this speaker I use it to listen to books ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this speaker I use it to listen to books from my ipad while driving my long commute to work and back. The sound is very clear and it can go quite loud.
customer_reviews.author: Jona

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this item 5 stars because I absolutely love my SuperTooth. I am not a fan of the Bluetooth system that goes in your ear so this item is perfect for me. Not only is it hands free but the sound quality is exceptional. It's small in size and fits perfectly on my visor. I have an iPhone 5s and I had no problems getting connected. I would highly recommend it to anyone that needs a system for their car. I have actually already recommended it to a few friends plus I got one for my daughter to use in her car. This would be a great gift for a new driver.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Dependable and user friendly
customer_reviews.text: This works great! I bought it so that I could talk to my mom on the phone without getting a ticket. This has great clarity and is very easy to operate. It does drop calls occasionally, but it could just as easily have been the phone that dropped the call and not this. I highly recommend this for both ease of operation and dependability.
customer_reviews.author: Mysteri

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST I EVER OWNED.
customer_reviews.text: THE CRYSTAL PORTABLE VISOR BLUETOOTH IS THE ABSOLUTE BEST I HAVE EVER OWNED.EASY TO PAR WITH YOUR CELL PHONE.IT'S REALLY LOUD TOO. YOU WON'T NEED IT TURNED UP A LOT TO HEAR YOUR CALLER.ALSO IT'S VERY CLEAR,NO STATIC.I HAVE HAD TWO OTHER BLUETOOTH'S AND THEY BOTH WERE BUMMERS.ALSO THIS ONE IS REALLY VERY SLIM AND LOOKS NICE ON THE CAR VISOR.I'M THRILLED WITH IT. I'M SURE YOU WILL BE TOO.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Harvey

customer_reviews.title: ... speaker with my plain old cell phone (not a smart phone) and have been told that it sounds better ...
customer_reviews.text: Have used this Bluetooth speaker with my plain old cell phone (not a smart phone) and have been told that it sounds better than the factory installed system in my car. It paired up easily with several different phones, smart phones and not-so-smart ones. I basically bought it for an older motor home, but have not had the chance to try it yet. Would recommend this product if you need a basic, hands free unit.
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: Must for LEO
customer_reviews.text: Great, love the feature where it connects to the phone when you get in the car. Good battery life (13 days 10hrs/day of use before charging). Plays music off the phone. The other person can hear me clearly. Strong magnet (specially needed for my patrol car).
customer_reviews.author: Pakitullanc

customer_reviews.title: Product OK, Process not so much
customer_reviews.text: The Supertooth Visor Handsfree kit works very well. The bluetooth connected quickly and without issues, unlike some other similar kits I have used. Incoming calls connect seamlessly. No issues at all with outgoing calls. This one works.The order / shipping process, on the other hand I ordered this on the 19th of the month. I was notified by email that it had shipped on the 27th and got the package in the mail on the 29th. ???? Good thing I wasn't in a hurry.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Haley

customer_reviews.title: does exactly what I need!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a used car without bluetooth. This took minutes to link and has worked great. Better than my new car with a bluetooth system installed. It sounds great and actually picks up my phone before I get inside, which was a minor deal when I walked too close to the car already on the phone.
customer_reviews.author: HWildDragon

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: I must buy one a month of various Bluetooth devices, and none of them work to my satisfaction; can't hear on my end, the recipient can't hear on their end, all of my conversations seem to be screamed, and I ended up with a headache at the end of the day. I've had this one for about a month now, and all is well; I can hear the caller clear as a bell, and I have stopped screaming, because my voice is just as clear on the other end. Happiness is a clear conversation!
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Holle

customer_reviews.title: Convenient device
customer_reviews.text: Great device if you don’t have built in Bluetooth in your car. I have used this device for years.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel S Flores

customer_reviews.title: Can no longer hear callers!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t hear anymore after 2-3 mins. However my callers can still hear me. This occurs sporadically. Did not even have this for a long period...now have to order another one but for sure not the same brand.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra C.

customer_reviews.title: Love My SuperTooth
customer_reviews.text: The reception on my SuperTooth is clear and loud for calls and navigation. There is not a problem with noise. I was a little confused after reading reviews on several bluetooths but I am very happy that I chose to purchase this one.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Well, the shipping was amazing Amazon
customer_reviews.text: The external visor speaker works well but is a bit wonky attaching to clip. The USB charge adapter cord broke on first use - a huge disappointment, but thankfully the detachable speaker unit has a universal plug insert that I could use with another USB camera charger cord. The price was too high for the package deal and shipping. My overall impression is that I would not recommend this product to family or friends and I would not buy another Supertooth product.
customer_reviews.author: J. Rucker

customer_reviews.title: Crystal clear
customer_reviews.text: Best hands free kit that I have used. It is crystal clear and plenty loud even in my jeep with off-road tires. Pairs easily and is just the right signal strength so that when I go in the house it disconnects.
customer_reviews.author: ScottJ

customer_reviews.title: Awesome device!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this unit hoping that it wasn't going to be another foray into poor Bluetooth technology with sub-standard noise cancelling. What I got was a great product that does what it says it will do and does it very well. Noise cancelling is very good, sound quality is very good and it just plain works very well. My wife is extremely pleased with her new gift! Her car has produced problems in the past with noise on hands-free devices but not with this unit. Top marks all round.
customer_reviews.author: Destroyer

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with it and when I used it with my Samsung Android it worked flawlessly. When I use it with my HTC Android, the people on the receiving end complain about my voice coming through garbled. I gave one to my Goddaughter to use with her IPhone. She loves it! I honestly believe my difficulty using it is my HTC Android phone compatibility.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great speakerphone...
customer_reviews.text: I use this while on travel as a speakerphone moreso than a handsfree device in my car. While not being as clear as the built-in system in my car, it's FAR better than the speakerphone on my phone. Great product at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: TrekSurfer

customer_reviews.title: SuperTooth ZOO4O- 98E is a excellent product and I have highly recommended it it to ...
customer_reviews.text: The two that I have purchased we have found to be exceptional. As soon as we get into the car it switches over to the bluetooth and works tremendously. Once you leave the vehicle it switches right back to your phone. My friends have purchased other brands and when they leave their vehicle many times their bluetooth remains connected and they need to return to the vehicle to answer their calls. SuperTooth ZOO4O- 98E is a excellent product and I have highly recommended it it to many of my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Gary R. Grasso

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my husband for Christmas. He loves it. He calls me on it every night and you can't tell he is talking on a speaker. It sounds great and lasts a really long time. He only has to charge it one a week to one and a half weeks depending on how much he uses it.
customer_reviews.author: kendel

customer_reviews.title: Worked great but as of March 15
customer_reviews.text: Bought Sept. 2013. Worked great but as of March 15, 2015, is no longer working. Was very satisfied with it since I have a car that did not have Bluetooth. It became a law in our state you had to use hands free talking while in your car in July 2014. This had a 2 year guarantee. It worked great for 16 months.
customer_reviews.author: jane riley

customer_reviews.title: Best Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: For the money. Functions great and as of now it is the best one ive seen with good clarity , good life before recharging , compact , easy to use . i take it from car to car and perfect to use when you have a rental

customer_reviews.title: Received it earlier than expected
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered this item I was told it would take at least 8 days. Actually got it in 4. I bought it for my wife and she seems delighted at how simple this item operates. Phonecalls sound great. Music not so much. Only reason I'm giving it 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: This car kit works so well. It syncs as soon as I get in my car and the sound is really clear without background noise. I like it so well, I ordered another for a friend.

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with the purchase of this bluetooth device
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with the purchase of this bluetooth device. I gave my Motorola to my daughter and this was a replacement. The sound is good and the phone was very easy to connect to it.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: ok car kit but overpriced
customer_reviews.text: ok car kit but over priced... not very impressed with it for $40... feel like i can spend $15 and get the same grade product if I had spent more time doing research on Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Xpert

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 2 months. Started sounding choppy/staticky
customer_reviews.text: Worked great the first few months, then stopped working properly after the second month. Got all statically to the point that you barely make anything out. Charging it fully didn't make a difference. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: mjezzi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Choice
customer_reviews.text: For some time i was looking for a bluetooth for my auto. There are so many out there. I checked on Amazon and after carefully reading the reviews I chose this one. Its great. I highly recommend this product.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my hubby's truck. The charge lasts for months and the sound quality is great. He uses it all the time when talking to me and it's hard to tell he is on a speaker.

customer_reviews.title: I think I will like this once I get it figured out and how ...
customer_reviews.text: I think I will like this once I get it figured out and how to turn it off. Until then the battery runs down too fast. So it is close to dead when I need it.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter who moved to Japan. She loves it! Very easy to set up. I can hear her very clearly and she can hear us very clearly as well. I looked at the reviews on Amazon for different Visor Bluetooth devices and after comparing them, I thought this one would be best. So far we are very happy with the Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy C.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great and easy to set up. Will probably buy another one for the other vehicle. Had never heard of Supertooth until looking on Amazon, but glad I found it. Cant beat the quality for the money. Turns out the French can make something other than French People. Happy with purchase.

customer_reviews.title: FIVE STARS!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bluetooth for my car because I wanted to be safe on the road and not have to hold the phone while driving. I LOVE IT! Setup was simple and easy, battery life is still going after initial charge (Dec 20!), and most importantly, the sound quality is excellent! GREAT BUY! FIVE STARS★★★★★

customer_reviews.text: This works great and so much better than the first brand we tried. I love it because you can control Siri from the large button on the front.

customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my daughter who travels in Washington, DC traffic. She loves it! She can be hands free and pay attention to the road. She just opened the box and put it on the visor and was ready to use it! She says this has to be the best hands-free device ever!

customer_reviews.text: Nice and good volume. And no problem pairing with my iPhone 5c. What else can someone want. It does what it's should do.

customer_reviews.text: Works ok but sound quality not the best. This might be typical for units this small

customer_reviews.title: It works...
customer_reviews.text: Sounds quality isn't great but it's loud and there's never an issue with connectivity. The battery lasts a VERY long time between charges.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Just Amazing!! I really love it!! Fast shipping, great package! Very classy look, amazing sound, long lasting battery, lightweight, easy to pair!

customer_reviews.title: Love it.

customer_reviews.title: It works ok.

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased.

Will work with multiple phones in the car. Much better than having an earpiece hanging there for the entire drive... and sounds better, too.

customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, easy to use, good audio quality, paired with my iPhone easily. Highly recommend it.

customer_reviews.title: I really want to like this. Love the magnet

The only (small) con I can find is that I expected the battery to last a little longer - but considering it is on all the time and there is a a sinch to charge it while you're driving, it's no big deal. Great buy.

customer_reviews.text: It has great sound and is very easy to use...have used it many times and people can believe how clear the sound is on it

customer_reviews.text: The Bluetooth speaker worked well for about a week. After that the speaker stopped working however I could tell it was still paired with my phone (I have an Galaxy S3). When I tried using it, no sound came out. I couldn't contact customer support either because the company is based out of France. You're better off going with another product.

customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Wish it were a little louder so I could hear it better. Might be time to get the old ears checked.

customer_reviews.title: S5 compatible
customer_reviews.text: Setup was easy. Sounds great. Use this with my S5.

customer_reviews.title: Hope they liked it.

customer_reviews.text: Battery life, ease of use, easily mobile all are great but the real question is does it work? Volume and clarity exceeded expectations, new Illinois hands free law was easy to transition to with this purchase

customer_reviews.title: Spotty reception
customer_reviews.text: When I got this I was excited because I talk on the phone a lot for work in my car. I use a headset right now but wanted to get it off my head so I thought this would be perfect. the link between my phone and tis unit is very weak and it goes on and off between the phone speaker and this. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Super tooth crystal portable car speaker
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my purchase so far! I get crystal clear sound and I haven't had anyone complain about not being able to hear me when I am communicating with them or vice versa. It is certainly a steal for the price!

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Syncs easily with iPhone. Easy to use and voice quality is good.

customer_reviews.title: 声音很清晰Sound is very clear
customer_reviews.text: 电不关机能用7到10天,有时不能自动连接,大多数时候可以,通话质量很不错,要是有来电显示功能就好了。 Power can not shut down 7-10 days, sometimes does not automatically connect, most of the time you can, call quality is very good, if there is caller ID function just fine.

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: This arrived missing the clip to hang on the visor. Very frustrating

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 3 weeks and customer service isn't getting back to me
customer_reviews.text: I had this SuperTooth for about 3 weeks before the speaker started completely fuzzing out. Now I can barely make out what anyone is saying to me. I have been trying to get SuperTooth to replace the unit for me, but so far they have been unhelpful. At one point they told me I should work it out with Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: M. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: This device works well. It's compact and fits on my visor well. I'm giving it 4 stars because the battery doesnt last long. I just make sure I charge after I use it. Overall great product! I

customer_reviews.text: I had no trouble linking my phone to it and it works great. It detects the phone as soon as I am in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Abdul Ghaffar

customer_reviews.title: Great device
customer_reviews.text: Easy to sinc to phone and works perfectly- The sound is clear. I have had to get used to the beep it makes every time I get into car with my phone, but not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Jnnhsr

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: small, easy to connect easy to use, love the quick press redial to last number - easy mount on visor as well

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well in my car and has great battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Christa Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wife likes it. She said that once in a while it will disconnect. Otherwise ok.
customer_reviews.author: Charles P.

customer_reviews.title: This is my second one- first one wouldn't recharge battery ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one- first one wouldn't recharge battery. California law- no cell phone when driving- I can receive calls while I'm driving and pay attention to traffic.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Croxton

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: Easy to sett up & easy to use. Can hear it very well. I bought two. One for me & one for my husband.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I gave it to my daughter as a gift because she is constantly on the phone while driving. It was easy to program and the sound quality is very good on both ends. Great product for the price.

customer_reviews.text: This device works just great. The sound is loud and clear and it pairs easily and automatically when you come back to your car. Also, it works perfectly with iPhone 5! Some devices have the issue that driving directions would not come through the bluetooth speaker if you use Apple Maps. This device has full iOS/Siri/Maps support and works beautifully with my iPhone. AAA
customer_reviews.author: peter r

customer_reviews.title: The Best I've Ever Had
customer_reviews.text: This is everything it's said to be. Better than the $300 Parrot I had before. It is well worth the money

customer_reviews.text: works great, easy set up. wish it had a little more volume, but considering its size the sound quality is very good. would definately reccomend it.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful device, it meets all my expectations
customer_reviews.text: SuperTooth Z004098E Crystal Portable Visor Bluetooth is a life saver, its hands free, portable... heaven sent. If you're looking for an hand free experiance here's your chance. Wonderful device, it meets all my expectations.

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Had difficulty attaching to my visor as it ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Had difficulty attaching to my visor as it is very thick. Should have been an attachment compensating for that.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and very reliable
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for more than a year and I don't have one bad thing to say about it. The volume level is perfect, the battery life is excellent and it's very easy to setup and use in the car.

customer_reviews.title: Poor results
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our second car that did not have Bluetooth for the cell phones. Paring was easy. However, the sound quality was poor for the person on the other end. Lots of echoes and they could not understand what was being said on the phone call. Even pulled over to stop but nothing seems to help. Tried to return it to Amazon but the 30 days had past. I would sure look at anything but this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Purmort

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife and now I plan to myself one. Excellent product. Sounds clear on both ends and long battery life. I would recommend htis product.

customer_reviews.text: This speaker has great battery life even in the cold, and the sound is out of this world. Would recommend

customer_reviews.text: This was too aggravating to operate while trying to drive safely. Not a good option.

customer_reviews.text: Great option whenyou don't want something hanging off your ear.
customer_reviews.author: Denis

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Very clear sound and easy to use. Would recommend. Would be nice to have a sturdier mount, it slips off the magnet.
customer_reviews.author: Karen M. Pettinati

customer_reviews.title: go for it
customer_reviews.text: Better than I expected! Great value for money. If you are looking for something cheap that works well, buy it.
customer_reviews.author: YoYo

customer_reviews.title: A piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: Bought this unit because of the good reviews. Connected it to my HTC Sensation and everyone complained about the muffled sound and road noise. I thought it was because of the old phone so just put this car kit aside. I finally got an iPhone 5 recently which voice quality is great by itself, and yet when I connect it to this bluetooth car kit, people still complain about the muffled sound, road noise, and sometimes disconnection. Unfortunately the return deadline already passed and there is no recourse, so this unit is a piece of junk to me now. Therefore, one star.
customer_reviews.author: Matt C.

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use in my convertable.the volume control make this unit loud enough to be heard above the wind noise
customer_reviews.author: Les Davis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tool.
customer_reviews.text: I drive an older model jeep to work so I have no Bluetooth for my phone or iPod. Works great for phone calls, streaming news or playing music.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Means

customer_reviews.title: Crystal Portable Visor Bluetooth Car Kit
customer_reviews.text: Generally a good product. Clarity seems a little unclear at times but worth the expense and worth the safety of driving hands free.
customer_reviews.author: dfrench

customer_reviews.title: Very good product. Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. It does what is supposed to. Battery life is good enough to keep you talking for several days before recharging.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis M. Aquino

customer_reviews.title: Supertooth Crystal hands free car kit
customer_reviews.text: This is the first hands free device I have purchased. I was surprised by the ease of operation. The sound quality is excellent for such a small package.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Wildy
